channel.title: Not sure if this is client or server based! Server Status Checker on Client
channel.description: Is it possible, that in the info panel before the login screen on a client, a server status checker could be placed. In any way? A self updating status checker for my server? :| If anyone knows just tell me yes or no.

item.title: Not sure if this is client or server based! Server Status Checker on Client

item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Is it possible, that in the info panel before the login screen on a client, a server status checker could be placed. In any way? A self updating status checker for my server?
If anyone knows just tell me yes or no.
